definition: seeing sth for oneself is better than hearing about it from others
pinyin: er3 wen2 bu4 ru2 mu4 jian4

sentences.english: Everyone had either seen or heard of these huge creatures and knew where the problem lay.
sentences.chinese: 像这种大型生物，大家耳闻目睹，还知道问题所在。

sentences.english: TIGELLINUS: Sire I heard nothing concerning the matter.
I have long heard about Quanzhou.
sentences.chinese: 说起泉州我可是早有耳闻。

sentences.english: This article is to introduce the stylistic features and functions of the Hard-Sell advertisement.
sentences.chinese: “硬卖”广告是人们每天眼见耳闻的一种广告。

sentences.english: During that time I witnessed or heard about a lot of things.
sentences.chinese: 其间耳闻目睹的事，算起来也很不少。

sentences.english: We've heard it before: most Americans have a pretty big problem with food.
sentences.chinese: 我们一直对大多数美国人关于食物的问题有所耳闻。

sentences.english: They also explain why many educated Chinese have heard of punting.
sentences.chinese: 这也解释了为什么中国游客对剑桥的划船总有耳闻。

sentences.english: In the future, you can expect to hear and see much more of this young talent.
sentences.chinese: 未来，你会更多地期望耳闻目睹这位年轻的新秀。

sentences.english: I've heard that your company's medical plan is one of the best in the business.
sentences.chinese: 我早有耳闻你们公司的医疗保险在业界是最棒的。

sentences.english: THE early capital of China’s Song dynasty, Kaifeng (how many westerners have even heard of it?), was in the 11th century the greatest city on earth.
sentences.chinese: 开封，多少西方人对这座城市有所耳闻？

sentences.english: In the past few years, I have read much about your corporation and its excellent management.
sentences.chinese: 过去的几年中，我对贵公司和其杰出的管理有所耳闻。

sentences.english: You have probably heard all of this before.
sentences.chinese: 也许您对此早就有所耳闻。

sentences.english: You hear about it in various terms that sound abstract.
sentences.chinese: 你们会对风险管理的抽象语汇有所耳闻。

sentences.english: First, people have already heard the arguments against the practice.
sentences.chinese: 首先，人们对反对这种做法的理由已有耳闻。

definition: to listen/to hear what sb says/news one has heard
slight knowledge of sth/to know very little about a subject/a smattering
to learn sth through hearsay/to get wind of sth
lit. like thunder piercing the ear/a well-known reputation (idiom)
as far as I know/to the best of my knowledge
famous name/your distinguished name/one's formal personal name
Daming county in Handan 邯鄲|邯郸[Han2 dan1], Hebei
see 盡人皆知|尽人皆知[jin4 ren2 jie1 zhi1]
